reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

title.narrative: Financing of the regional Ebola reaction measure

description.narrative: UNICEF helps to reinforce and scale up Ebola prevention and preparedness activities in Benin, Burkina Faso, Cote D’Ivoire, Ghana, Guinea Bissau, Mali, Nigeria & Senegal. Support government, UN actors and NGOs in Ebola preparedness and response planning, Strengthen mechanisms of community-led contact tracing of Ebola-exposed patpatients in intense transmission areas.
UNICEF hilft, Bereitschaftstätigkeiten in Benin, Burkina Faso, Cote D'Ivoire, Ghana, Guinea Bissau, Mali, Nigeria; Senegal zur Verhinderung und Eindämmung von EBOLA zu verstärken.

UNICEF helps to reinforce and scale up Ebola prevention and preparedness activities in Benin, Burkina Faso, Cote D’Ivoire, Ghana, Guinea Bissau, Mali, Nigeria & Senegal. Support government, UN actors and NGOs in Ebola preparedness and response planning, Strengthen mechanisms of community-led contact tracing of Ebola-exposed patpatients in intense transmission areas.
